title: What is Grokking and What are the Latest Academic Developments on Grokking Research?
description: The term 'grokking' originates from Robert A. Heinlein's science fiction novel 'Stranger in a Strange Land.' In contemporary contexts, grokking has found relevance in various fields including games-based learning and artificial intelligence (AI). This report aims to elucidate the concept of grokking and highlight the latest academic developments associated with it.
